description:
There is only one man in Congress who has dedicated so much time fighting to use the women’s restroom. It also turns out that that same man claims he’s all in it for women’s rights, despite doing everything in his power to destroy female-only space.

Rep. Sarah McBride spoke at a protest claiming that Trump needs to get his "hands off" of things like women's rights.

“We’re telling him [Trump].. hands off our kids! Hands off women’s rights!” - Tim McBride, the dude who dresses up as a woman and mocks females and wants kids to chop off their body parts pic.twitter.com/SM1bXKzkSB
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) April 7, 2025
title: Trans congress(wo)man pledges they/them will fight Trump agenda, says hands off (real) women's rights

description:
So, while the left cannot handle a joke if their life depends on it, so much so that they would rather cancel people into oblivion, it’s rather odd that Jasmine Crockett got no heat after calling Greg Abbott, who can’t walk and uses a wheelchair, “Gov. Hot Wheels.”

Chris Cuomo and Bill Maher claimed to know the reason for the phenomena, which is that it’s because she is “a black woman.”

🚨NEW: Chris Cuomo and Bill Maher say the only reason Rep. Jasmine Crockett wasn't canceled for her Gov. Abbott remarks is because she's a black woman🚨

CUOMO: "Because it's a black woman who's doing it, they're not gonna cancel her."

MAHER: "You're right. She wears the magic… pic.twitter.com/3fjJW8F1c1
— Jason Cohen 🇺🇸 (@
title: Bill Maher, Chris Cuomo admit quiet part out loud why Jasmine Crockett gets away with offensive attacks: "She's black"

description:
Even if the left believes it is compassionate to affirm the delusional feelings of a fraction of the population, the least you would expect is that they disregard this demand for the scummiest of people on earth. That is not the case when you are beholden to an ideology despite the expense of being morally and factually incorrect.

Jennifer Melle was suspended from her job as a nurse after calling a trans pedophile “Mister.”

Christian nurse, Jennifer Melle, has now been suspended by the NHS for telling her story about how she was investigated for referring to a 6ft male paedophile patient as 'Mr'.

The patient wanted to be referred to as a female, and is in prison for luring boys into sex acts while… https://t.co/pCnunZYf
title: Nurse gets suspended for calling a racist pedophile prisoner (who attacked her) by the wrong pronouns

description:
A woman attacked a pro-life activist during a street interview, and now the suspect is speaking out while she not only blames her victim but also portrays herself as a victim.

Last week, Brianna Rivers chose to insert herself in a ‘man on the street’ type of video. However, given that many leftists cannot handle the truth, Rivers decided the most rational thing to do in the moment that “her truth” was rejected was to assault an innocent woman in the face.

As a typical leftist, Rivers has now decided to blame the victim to turn herself as the victim, and claims she “will not allow [her] image to be defamed.”

Brianna Rivers, the Bronx left-wing woman who double suc
title: Woman who attacked pro-life activist DEFENDS her heinous actions: “I will not allow my image to be defamed”

description:
Over 1,000 “Hands Off” protests broke out across the country in response to the Trump Administration's goal of making government more efficient. Today’s show breaks it down.

"When the left accuses you of something, they are telling on themselves," Crowder said. “This is very clearly NGO supported protests, this is not grassroots. That’s why you never really heard of it and why no one you know has attended it.”

title: Watch: Lunatics protested in American cities against Donald Trump and Elon Musk and here's who funded them

description:

description:
Men continue to dominate women’s sports. What did they take over this time? Meanwhile, there were a lot of protests over the weekend and you’re (not) going to be surprised who sponsored them.

Are you trying to explain your hot take on tariffs but you keep sounding like a Commie? Don’t worry, we’re here to help. We’re going over all the fallout and giving you the tools you need to discuss tariffs in the calm, rational way we know you've been looking for.

TWO DUDES IN WOMEN’S POOL FINAL?
title: Black Monday: Trump's Tariffs are Causing Global Panic - But Should They? (Sources)

description:
Despite Donald Trump's best efforts to executive order this lunacy into oblivion, two men are making history by making it to the finals of a WOMEN'S billiards tournament. Not unlike when the East German Women's Olympic Team presented American icon Nick Rivers with a medal (RIP Val Kilmer), neither of these broads passes the eyeball test. But you only have to claim to be a woman in order to beat women in women's women-only competitions. Why? Because you're a transphobe for asking questions.

In fairness to Trump's EOs, the contest was in the UK, where a) the EOs have no legal basis, and b) nothing matters.

🚨BREAKING🚨

Two men will face each other for a women's championship title at the Ultimate Pool Women's Pro Series Event 2 tonight in Wigan, UK.

H
title: Two men shatter glass ceiling, make it to finals of WOMEN'S billiards tournament (because they claim to be... you know)
